channel.title: Music : Complexity Ratio
channel.description:
This is what [b][u]I believe[/u][/b] the Music : Complexity Ratio is.
X axis is the Genre of music
Y axis is the level of complexity, 0 being lowest, 100 being highest.
[img]http://i59.tinypic.com/28lxfr7.png[/img]
I'm looking forward to haters.

item.title: Music : Complexity Ratio
item.dc:creator: @asyo4 asyo4
item.description:
@asyo4 wrote:

[quote=“Limits, post:42, topic:544056”][quote author=asyo4 link=topic=662936.msg4437162#msg4437162 date=1405471643]

from a producers point of view there isnt much science behind it this is pretty how u feel about it

Are you a professional producer?

of course not haha I wish. im a bedroom producer in high school but i use professional grade software

I produce my own music too! And i’m in high school as well!

ah sick man im glad to hear there are other producers on here, i dropped programming back in 2011 to pick up producing and ivebeen doing it ever since
[/quote]
I do both since I want to be a game developer in the future. What genre do you produce?[/quote]

anything electronical but ive been making some orchestral things lately for various projects

Read full topic

item.title: Music : Complexity Ratio
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Whackatre, post:34, topic:544056”][quote author=Limits link=topic=662936.msg4430899#msg4430899 date=1403190001]

It’s almost as if OP doesn’t realize the absurdity of nearly every topic he creates on this forum. I think passion is far more important than musical complexity, which is inherently pointless without the aforementioned (e.g. intolerable technical wanker bullshit). That said, while I do like listening to and analyzing more technically complex music, the feelings and emotions evoked during a listen have a much larger value in my opinion. Fuck off with your silly elitist bullshit generalizations.

Where in this thread did I say that complex music is better than simpler music?
[/quote]

You implied it in quite a few areas. The entire thread, for example.

Original thread title: “Re: Music : Average Intelligence Ratio”

You said that it was a “mistake”, but I am fairly sure that is exactly what you meant. And does that refer to the intelligence of the average listener or composer? Either way you should feel bad.

I’m looking forward to haters.

Well, all right.

Oh, well this wasn’t based on IQ… It’s going from 0 being a simple mind (not able to comprehend complexity) and 100 being a highly developed mind (able to understand complex time signatures, polyphony, and can comprehend the melody)

You suggest a disparity exactly here.

I can only assume you are butthurt because the genre of music you like is not rated high.

:rolleyes:

In other words – you already realize you are shitposting, so begone![/quote]
his haters make him famous

you know his name not his story

only god can judge him

forget being a hater because somebody loves him

gratata swag bitch

Read full topic

Original thread title: “Re: Music : Average Intelligence Ratio”

You said that it was a “mistake”, but I am fairly sure that is exactly what you meant. And does that refer to the intelligence of the average listener or composer? Either way you should feel bad.

Limits:

I’m looking forward to haters.

Well, all right.

Limits:

Oh, well this wasn’t based on IQ… It’s going from 0 being a simple mind (not able to comprehend complexity) and 100 being a highly developed mind (able to understand complex time signatures, polyphony, and can comprehend the melody)

You suggest a disparity exactly here.

Limits:

I can only assume you are butthurt because the genre of music you like is not rated high.

:rolleyes:

In other words – you already realize you are shitposting, so begone!

“Complexity Ratio”? More like “My Opinion Ratio”.

I can only assume you are butthurt because the genre of music you like is not rated high.
